content: Write a poem about the moon with exactly 60 words.

Silent sentinel in the night's expanse,
Moon, you paint the sky with gentle grace.
Your phases whisper tales of time's dance,
A luminous guide through darkness' embrace.

In your glow, dreams take flight,
Shadows play, and secrets hide.
You cradle stars in your soft light,
And Earth below, you proudly stride.

From new to full, you ever change,
Yet forever you remain the same.
Moon, in your embrace, we arrange
Our hopes and fears, a timeless game.

So here's to you, up in the sky,
Guiding us with your silent sigh.
